mapper.select: select * from MANAGER_PERSON t where t.ID_NUMBER = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into MANAGER_PERSON (ID_NUMBER, ID_TYPE, ID_NAME, ID_MEDICIALCARE, SEX, AGE, CODE_AREA, ID_HOUSER, ID_GROUP, STATUS_CODE, STATUS_WEDDING, EDUCATION, DATE_BORN, DATE_DIE, PHONE, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, ID_WECHAT, ID_QQ, ENTR_TIME, ALTER_TIME ) values (#{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idMedicialcare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{codeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idHouser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idGroup,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{statusCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{statusWedding,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{education,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{dateBorn,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dateDie,jdbcType=DATE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into MANAGER_PERSON
ID_NUMBER,
ID_TYPE,
ID_NAME,
ID_MEDICIALCARE,
SEX,
AGE,
CODE_AREA,
ID_HOUSER,
ID_GROUP,
STATUS_CODE,
STATUS_WEDDING,
EDUCATION,
DATE_BORN,
DATE_DIE,
PHONE,
TELEPHONE,
EMAIL,
ID_WECHAT,
ID_QQ,
ENTR_TIME,
ALTER_TIME,
